Package me.talkcode.acc.core.builtin

Class AbstractJournal

java.lang.Object
me.talkcode.acc.core.builtin.AbstractJournal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Book, Journal
public abstract class AbstractJournal extends Object implements Journal
An abstract implementation of a Journal. Implementations of Journal are expected to extend this class, as it performs some heavy lifting. This class implements the Transaction posting logic, including TransactionFiltering and execution of TransactionListener. This implementation works with AbstractContext
